instruction: Construct a tweet about a fictional book using 280 characters.
input: Book title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
output: Just finished an adventurous read: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer. Daring escapes, hidden fortunes, and unforgettable characters make this classic an adventure worth rediscovering. #TheAdventuresOfTomSawyer #BooksAreForever  # MustRead
